SOURCE.item: *below code written to control Show/hide values in MB52 std tcode
* but later on we decided to call std program from Z tcodes hence no need of below code
* as we have already given authorisation of ZMB52 and ZMB52_VAL to resp users .
*** based on authorisation display/ hide values in MB52 ,
***if in SU01, parameter ZMB52_VALUE maintained with value 'X' , display value related columns in Report MB52
*below code written to control Show/hide values in MB52 std tcode
* but later on we decided to call std program from Z tcodes hence no need of below code
* as we have already given authorisation of ZMB52 and ZMB52_VAL to resp users . 18.12.2018
DATA: hsdat TYPE mch1-hsdat, " Date of Manufacture "PUNAM
vfdat TYPE mch1-vfdat, "Shelf Life Exp. Date "PUNAM
kbetr TYPE konp-kbetr, " Rate (condition amount or percentage) where no scale exists
atwrt_pg TYPE ausp-atwrt, " Price group (customer) updated in msc2n for existing batches
atwrt_txt TYPE t188t-vtext, " PRICE GRP TXT updated in msc2n for existing batches
other_kbetr TYPE konp-kbetr, " Rate (condition amount or percentage) for MSC2n/COR2 PG
mvgr5 TYPE mvke-mvgr5, " material group 5 , indicator for bulk branded product
lgpbe TYPE mard-lgpbe, "storage bin added pravin 25/9/15
ersda TYPE mchb-ersda, " Loc Received Date - Added by CS on 30.12.2015
laeda TYPE mchb-laeda, " Last movement Date - Added by CS on 30.12.2015
" IHDK906667: MM: S_K: MB52: Enh: add batch purity values: KV/US: 25.5.20
DATA: hsdat TYPE mch1-hsdat, " Date of Manufacture "PUNAM
vfdat TYPE mch1-vfdat, "Shelf Life Exp. Date "PUNAM
kbetr TYPE konp-kbetr, " Rate (condition amount or percentage) where no scale exists
konda_txt TYPE t188t-vtext, " PRICE GRP TXT
atwrt_pg TYPE ausp-atwrt, " Price group (customer) updated in msc2n for existing batches
atwrt_txt TYPE t188t-vtext, " PRICE GRP TXT updated in msc2n for existing batches
mvgr5 TYPE mvke-mvgr5, " material group 5 , indicator for bulk branded product
ersda TYPE mchb-ersda, " Loc Received Date - Added by CS on 30.12.2015
laeda TYPE mchb-laeda. " Last movement Date - Added by CS on 30.12.2015
extwg LIKE mara-extwg, " external material grp
kbetr TYPE konp-kbetr, " Rate (condition amount or percentage) where no scale exists
atwrt_pg TYPE ausp-atwrt, " Price group (customer) updated in msc2n for existing batches
atwrt_txt TYPE t188t-vtext, " PRICE GRP TXT updated in msc2n for existing batches
mvgr5 TYPE mvke-mvgr5, " material group 5 , indicator for bulk branded product
lgpbe TYPE mard-lgpbe, "storage bin added by pravin date - 25/09/15
DATA: it_a605 TYPE TABLE OF a605,
it_mard LIKE STANDARD TABLE OF wa_mard,
it_mch1 LIKE STANDARD TABLE OF wa_mch1,
it_csize LIKE STANDARD TABLE OF wa_csize,
it_div_desc LIKE STANDARD TABLE OF wa_div_desc,
it_ausp_objek LIKE STANDARD TABLE OF wa_ausp_objek,
it_inob_objek LIKE STANDARD TABLE OF wa_inob_objek,
it_ausp LIKE STANDARD TABLE OF wa_ausp,
it_ausp2 LIKE STANDARD TABLE OF wa_ausp,
it_plant LIKE STANDARD TABLE OF wa_plant,
it_t005h LIKE STANDARD TABLE OF wa_t005h,
it_b_mrp LIKE STANDARD TABLE OF wa_b_mrp,
it_konp LIKE STANDARD TABLE OF wa_konp,
it_t188t LIKE STANDARD TABLE OF wa_t188t,
it_inob LIKE STANDARD TABLE OF wa_inob,
it_mvke LIKE STANDARD TABLE OF wa_mvke,
it_tvm5t LIKE STANDARD TABLE OF wa_tvm5t,
ersda TYPE mchb-ersda, " Loc Received Date - Added by CS on 30.12.2015
laeda TYPE mchb-laeda, " Last movement Date - Added by CS on 30.12.2015
it_mchb LIKE STANDARD TABLE OF wa_mchb.
CONCATENATE bestand-matnr bestand-charg INTO wa_inob_objek-objek SEPARATED BY lv_space.
* FOR ALL ENTRIES IN bestand " Commented since this slows the query, select all with read is much faster
SELECT matnr werks lgort charg ersda laeda
" IHDK906667 - MM: S_K: MB52: Enh: add batch purity values: KV/US: 25.5.20
data lt_bestand like standard table of bestand.
sort lt_inspection_lot by plant material batch.
READ TABLE it_mard INTO wa_mard WITH KEY matnr = bestand-matnr
READ TABLE it_mch1 INTO wa_mch1 WITH KEY matnr = bestand-matnr
MESSAGE ID sy-msgid TYPE sy-msgty NUMBER sy-msgno
READ TABLE it_b_mrp INTO wa_b_mrp WITH KEY matnr = bestand-matnr
READ TABLE it_a605 INTO wa_a605 WITH KEY spart = bestand-spart
READ TABLE it_mvke INTO wa_mvke WITH KEY matnr = bestand-matnr
READ TABLE it_mchb INTO wa_mchb WITH KEY matnr = bestand-matnr
" IHDK906667 - MM: S_K: MB52: Enh: add batch purity values: KV/US: 25.5.20
loop at lt_inspection_result into data(ls_result) where inspection_lot = ls_inspection_lot-inspection_lot.
DELETE bestand[] WHERE cityc NOT IN cityc.
"Get sales district and external material group
READ TABLE lt_t171t INTO DATA(ls_t171t) with KEY bzirk = ls_sales_dis-bzirk.
READ TABLE it_div_desc INTO DATA(ls_div) with KEY matnr = <fs_bestand>-matnr.
IF sy-subrc eq 0 and ls_div-extwg IS NOT INITIAL.
READ TABLE lt_TWEWt INTO DATA(ls_TWEWt) with KEY extwg = ls_div-extwg.
SELECTION-SCREEN BEGIN OF BLOCK custom_fields WITH FRAME TITLE text-208.
extwg FOR mara-extwg. " Ext. Material Group
DATA: lt_zbestand TYPE TABLE OF zbestand,
import lv_dwn TO lv_dwn from MEMORY ID 'BESTAND_DWN'.
